about.title: ABOUT ME
about.p1: I'm a software developer passionate about technology, based in Recife-PE, and recently graduated from Embarque Digital, where I discovered my passion for this field. I study English at ABA and I'm always striving to improve, take on challenges, and dive into new projects.
about.p2: I have experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, React, Node.js, Java, Python, and ServiceNow. I have worked on projects focused on creating intuitive and well-structured interfaces, ensuring a smooth, responsive, and pleasant user experience.

step1.title: Beginning
step1.description: I had just started my ADS course, and everything was new to me, but I quickly fell in love with technology. At Rec'N'Play, I had my first real exposure to the field and realized that this was exactly the path I wanted to follow!
